mapper.insert: insert into log_operate (oper_time, oper_name, oper_ip, title, business_type, request_method, oper_url, status, cost_time, error_msg) values (#{operTime}, #{operName}, #{operIp}, #{title}, #{businessType}, #{requestMethod}, #{operUrl}, #{status}, #{costTime}, #{errorMsg});
insert into log_login (account, status, msg, ipaddr, access_time) values (#{account}, #{status}, #{msg}, #{ipaddr}, #{accessTime});
